fields.value:
- If you maul a Fallen Angel, you'll be able to attack an additional player the next night. This only applies to the initial target of your attack.
- If you maul a non-Fallen Angel, you'll be roleblock and redirect immune the next night.

You may also choose any role from that faction to be converted into, except for Espionage roles. You retain the ability to convert upon converting, but you may never convert to being aligned with a good faction through any means.
